overview: A young woman comes across an old diary while shopping for a new home. Reading the diary aloud in the company of her broker, a friend and her male companion, an erotic story unfolds. The diary is filled with sexually charged tales detailing the past, present and future of a nearby garden. After becoming aroused by the erotic stories, the four breakout into a fiery orgy brought to full burn by newcomer Angela Austin. In her first ever appearance on film or video, Angela Austin is a tall ravishing beauty with an insatiable sexual hunger that will enflame the viewers lust even further.
title: The Garden Party
